name: AddMediaIntent
desc: An object that describes the user’s request to add media items to their library or to a specific playlist.

items.name: mediaItems
items.desc: The media items to add to the user’s library or to a playlist.

items.name: mediaSearch
items.desc: Parameters that describe the media items to add to the user’s library or to a playlist.

items.name: mediaDestination
items.desc: The library or playlist to modify.
